title: Machine Learning-Based Residential Complex Layout Design Experimental Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental urban design concepts and introductory machine learning knowledge
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, domain expertise: beginner, assessment method: formative assessment-centered, technological environment: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device).

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain key elements of residential complex layout design (plaza paving, green spaces, public facilities, spatial structure).
Learners can execute a generative design process using the Pix2pix model step-by-step.
Learners can analyze machine learning-based design results using quantitative and qualitative evaluation techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
